page.shortlink: api client api a5 ink class

argument.name: containerId
argument.description: The ID of the element the ink control should be rendered in.

argument.name: settings
argument.description: Settings for the ink control. This will override the initial values of the properties of the A5.Ink class.

property.name: theme
property.description: The theme to use on the ink control.

property.name: override
property.description: The overrides to use on the ink control.

property.name: inputId
property.description: The ID of an input that the ink value should be put in on commit.

property.name: autoCommit
property.description: Whether to auto commit or not. The default value is "false". If the amount of ink the user will be drawing is little, then autoCommit can be set tot "true". Otherwise it should not be set, as a commit will happen each time the user draws a stroke. If autoCommit is "false", then you will have to use the A5.Ink.commit method to commit the ink.

property.name: layout
property.description: The layout to use. The values can be "split" for a split layout, "view" to see just the view part, "editor" to see just the editor, or "detached-view" to show the view in another container. See A5.Ink.view.detached.id to set the view containers ID.

property.name: previewSize
property.description: The max size in pixels of the preview to render when the ink is being dynamically navigated, such as by a pan or pinch zoom. The higher the number the sharper the preview, but the longer it will take to render.

property.name: page
property.description: The base page settings. See *[link:A5.InkPage Settings Object]*.

property.name: view
property.description: Settings for the view part.

property.name: detached
property.description: Settings for the view part when it is detached.

property.name: id
property.description: The ID of the element to put the view in when the layout is "detached-view". Note: if using a detached view, you cannot use other layouts.

property.name: scale
property.description: Automatic scaling of the view part. Either set to "false" to do no auto scaling, or an object with scaling information.

property.name: fit
property.description: How to fit the ink into the view. Values are "both", "width" or "height"

property.name: margin
property.description: The number of pixels to add as a margin to each side.

property.name: lock
property.description: Whether to lock the scaling so that the user cannot change it manually.

property.name: className
property.description: The class name to put on the view part.

property.name: zoomBox
property.description: Settings for the zoom box (the area that shows what the editors view is).

property.name: className
property.description: The class name to put on the zoom box.

property.name: navigateClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the zoom box when navigation is occuring, such as pinch zoom.

property.name: scale
property.description: Settings for the zoom box scale. Scaling the zoom box will change the scale of the editor part.

property.name: allow
property.description: Whether to allow the zoom box to be scaled.

property.name: className
property.description: The class name to put on the zoom box when scaling is allowed.

property.name: page
property.description: Settings for the view part ink page.

property.name: className
property.description: The class name to put on the page.

property.name: offset
property.description: The number of pixels offset to include for view part ink page. This can be used to compensate for a border on the page.

property.name: overlay
property.description: Settings for the view part overlay.

property.name: show
property.description: Whether to show the overlay.

property.name: html
property.description: The HTML to put in the overlay. Elements in the HTML can have an "a5-item" attribute put on them to be attached to named items in A5.Ink.items object. Values of "{id}" in the HTML will be replaced with the container ID of the A5.Ink class instance, allowing easy creation of unique IDs.

property.name: editor
property.description: Settings for the editor part.

property.name: scale
property.description: Automatic scaling of the editor part. Either set to "false" to do no auto scaling, or an object with scaling information.

property.name: fit
property.description: How to fit the ink into the editor. Values are "both", "width" or "height"

property.name: margin
property.description: The number of pixels to add as a margin to each side.

property.name: lock
property.description: Whether to lock the scaling so that the user cannot change it manually.

property.name: className
property.description: The class name to put on the editor part.

property.name: page
property.description: Settings for the editor part ink page.

property.name: className
property.description: The class name to put on the page.

property.name: offset
property.description: The number of pixels offset to include for editor part ink page. This can be used to compensate for a border on the page.

property.name: overlay
property.description: Settings for the editor part overlay.

property.name: show
property.description: Whether to show the overlay.

property.name: html
property.description: The HTML to put in the overlay. Elements in the HTML can have an "a5-item" attribute put on them to be attached to named items in A5.Ink.items object. Values of "{id}" in the HTML will be replaced with the container ID of the A5.Ink class instance, allowing easy creation of unique IDs.

property.name: split
property.description: Settings for the split layout.

property.name: layout
property.description: The split layout to use. The values can be "v-view-editor" for vertical view over editor, "v-editor-view" for vertical editor over view, "h-view-editor" for horizontal view over editor, or "h-editor-view" for horizontal editor over view.

property.name: size
property.description: The size of the editor in the split layout. Values can be in CSS units such as "px", "pt" or "in".

property.name: minSize
property.description: The minimum size of the view in the split layout. Values can be in CSS units such as "px", "pt" or "in".

property.name: bar
property.description: The Settings for the split bar, a line to draw between the editor and the view when in split mode.

property.name: show
property.description: Whether to show the split bar.

property.name: size
property.description: The size of the split bar. Values can be in CSS units such as "px", "pt" or "in".

property.name: className
property.description: The class name to put on the split bar.

property.name: verticalClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the split bar when the split is vertical.

property.name: horizontalClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the split bar when the split is horizontal.

property.name: items
property.description: Object containing named items that can be put into the view or editor overlays using the "a5-item" attribute.

property.name: item
property.description: A named item. You can have an arbitrary number of these items with any name you want, such as "pan" or "setPen".

property.name: onClick
property.description: The function to call when the user clicks on this item. Note: the scope of this function is the A5.Ink class instance.

argument.name: element
argument.description: The element that was clicked on.

argument.name: argument
argument.description: Extra argument on the "a5-item" attribute. Argument is the string after the first ":" in the value of "a5-item"

argument.name: part
argument.description: Which part the click happened in. The value is either "view" or "editor".

property.name: tools
property.description: Settings for tools.

property.name: pen
property.description: Settings for the pen tool.

property.name: activeClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the editor part when the pen tool is active.

property.name: smooth
property.description: The amount the pen tool should be smoothed. The default value is "2". A higher value will result in fewer ink points being drawn.

property.name: memory
property.description: Settings for how pens should be remembered.

property.name: load
property.description: What to do with the pen when ink is loaded. The default value is "current" to not change the pen. Other values are "last" to use the pen last used in the ink being loaded, or "base" to restore to the base pen defined in A5.Ink.tools.pen.base.

property.name: clear
property.description: What to do with the pen when ink is cleared. The default value is "current" to not change the pen. The other value is "base" to restore to the base pen defined in A5.Ink.tools.pen.base.

property.name: base
property.description: Settings for the base pen.

property.name: color
property.description: The color in CSS format for the pen.

property.name: width
property.description: The width of the pen.

property.name: lineCap
property.description: The line cap for the pen. Values are "round", "square" or "butt".

property.name: preview
property.description: Settings for the optional pen preview, which will be drawn in the element with an ID of the container ID of the A5.Ink class instance plus ".PENPREVIEW".

property.name: size
property.description: The size of the preview in pixels. The default is "38".

property.name: width
property.description: Pen width display settings.

property.name: show
property.description: When to show the width of the pen as a number in the preview. Values are "never" to never show it, or "auto" to show it when the width is not easily noticable because the width is greater then the preview size.

property.name: clip
property.description: Pen preview clipping settings.

property.name: shape
property.description: The shape to clip the preview. The values are "circle" or "none".

property.name: eraser
property.description: Settings for the eraser tool.

property.name: activeClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the editor part when the eraser tool is active.

property.name: areaClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the eraser area.

property.name: size
property.description: The size of the eraser in pixels. The default is "50".

property.name: max
property.description: The maximum size of the eraser in pixels. The default is "400".

property.name: min
property.description: The minimum size of the eraser in pixels. The default is "20".

property.name: pan
property.description: Settings for the pan tool.

property.name: activeClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the editor part when the pan tool is active.

property.name: status
property.description: Settings for status updates. Status messaged will be drawn in the element with an ID of the container ID of the A5.Ink class instance plus ".STATUS".

property.name: messages
property.description: Messages.

property.name: 'tool:pen'
property.description: The message to show when the pen tool is active. The default is "".

property.name: 'tool:eraser'
property.description: The message to show when the eraser tool is active. The default is "Eraser".

property.name: 'tool:pan'
property.description: The message to show when the pan tool is active. The default is "Drag to pan".

property.name: 'item:eraser'
property.description: The message to show when the user is pressing on an "a5-item" with the value of "*eraser". The default is "Drag to size eraser".

property.name: 'item:undo'
property.description: The message to show when the user is pressing on an "a5-item" with the value of "*undo". The default is "Drag to navigate undo stack".

property.name: 'item:redo'
property.description: The message to show when the user is pressing on an "a5-item" with the value of "*redo". The default is "Drag to navigate undo stack".

property.name: 'item:navigate'
property.description: The message to show when the user is pressing on an "a5-item" with the value of "*navigate". The default is "Drag to pan".

property.name: 'item:navigate:new-line'
property.description: The message to show when the user is pressing on an "a5-item" with the value of "*navigate" and teh argument is "new-line". The default is "Drag to move between lines".

property.name: onChange
property.description: Event fired when the ink changes.

argument.name: type
argument.description: The change event type, can be "setValue", "clear", "undo", "redo", or "edit".

property.name: onBeforeCommit
property.description: Event fired before the ink is committed.

property.name: onCommit
property.description: Event fired after the ink is committed.

argument.name: value
argument.description: The value of the ink in string format.

property.name: onToolChange
property.description: Event fired when the tool is changed.

argument.name: tool
argument.description: The name of the current tool.

argument.name: previousTool
argument.description: The name of the previous tool.

property.name: onPenChange
property.description: Event fired when the pen is changed.

argument.name: color
argument.description: The color in CSS format for the pen.

argument.name: lineCap
argument.description: The line cap for the pen. Values are "round", "square" or "butt".

property.name: onBackgroundChange
property.description: Event fired when the background is changed.

property.name: onLayout
property.description: Event fired when the ink controls layout changes.

property.name: state
property.description: The state of the ink.

property.name: active
property.description: The active part.

property.name: undo
property.description: Can undo.

property.name: redo
property.description: Can redo.

property.name: tool
property.description: The current tool.

property.name: type
property.description: The name of the tool type. Such as "pen" or "eraser".

property.name: sticky
property.description: Whether the tool is "sticky", meaning that it will stay active after user interaction.

property.name: settings
property.description: The current tool settings.

property.name: pen
property.description: The current pen.

property.name: color
property.description: The color in CSS format for the pen.

property.name: width
property.description: The width of the pen.

property.name: lineCap
property.description: The line cap for the pen. Values are "round", "square" or "butt".

property.name: view
property.description: The view part state.

property.name: shown
property.description: Whether the view part is shown.

property.name: autoScale
property.description: Whether the view part is auto scaled.

property.name: detached
property.description: Whether the view part is detached.

property.name: width
property.description: The width of the view part.

property.name: height
property.description: The height of the view part.

property.name: offset
property.description: The offset of the view part.

property.name: x
property.description: The x location of the view part.

property.name: y
property.description: The y location of the view part.

property.name: scale
property.description: The scale of the view part.

property.name: editor
property.description: The editor part state.

property.name: shown
property.description: Whether the editor part is shown.

property.name: autoScale
property.description: Whether the editor part is auto scaled.

property.name: width
property.description: The width of the editor part.

property.name: height
property.description: The height of the editor part.

property.name: offset
property.description: The offset of the editor part.

property.name: x
property.description: The x location of the editor part.

property.name: y
property.description: The y location of the editor part.

property.name: scale
property.description: The scale of the editor part.
